{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4182357,"totalDownVotes":763419,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":205394,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🎒  Better Backpack! 🎒
⭐️ New Favorites category!
🍎 New item stacking!
❔ Updated Tooltip in the backpack and trade window!
🐙  8 New Ocean pets to adopt!

🐦 Follow @PlayAdoptMe on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/PlayAdoptMe
🎥 Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/PlayAdoptMe

Meet the founders!
NewFissy - Tech Director (https://twitter.com/newfissy)
Bethink - Creative Director (https://twitter.com/Bethink_RBX) 

🔔🔔🔔 Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to get notified when new updates drop! 🔔🔔🔔

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":592872,"totalDownVotes":46072,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":80073,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1081560,"totalDownVotes":115227,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":258613,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1008799,"totalDownVotes":50618,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":48317,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3736190,"totalDownVotes":307740,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":56446,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":352128,"totalDownVotes":35478,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"[KAPI] Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":34182,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2741484,"totalDownVotes":359959,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":31892,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"골든 나이프로 처치하면 승리, 처치/도움 수를 늘려 골든 나이프를 얻는 길로 달려가요.

아스널에서 이제 15세 등급과 게임패드, 모바일을 지원해요. 또 새롭고 별난 무기들로 선두에 서 봐요!

상점은 매일 갱신됩니다. 새 아이템은 항상 로테이션 돼요!

변역인: TimeBinder"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":253770,"totalDownVotes":32813,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":20727,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":133229,"totalDownVotes":7418,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA 🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":17531,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":885451,"totalDownVotes":56697,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[2x Spawns] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":26016,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Tailed Spirit Ultimate Update:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3208306,"totalDownVotes":279694,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":40941,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"자신만의 멋진 집, 멋진 탈것을 만들고 설계하세요. 친구와 같이 놀거나, 일하거나, 역할 연기를 하거나 블록스부르크 시내를 탐험하세요. 가능성은 무한해요!"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2062791,"totalDownVotes":285836,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":34397,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":516942,"totalDownVotes":36023,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":20177,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2183174,"totalDownVotes":299021,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":62921,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙  ¡El juego que desarrolla tu imaginación!  ¡Charla, juega, gana monedas y personaliza tu casa! 💙

✨¡Estamos trabajando en más actualizaciones! 

💙 ¡Juega con millones de jugadores a MeepCity!"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4343281,"totalDownVotes":587657,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":21172,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👀


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1405837,"totalDownVotes":118291,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":27254,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Построй корабль и отправляйся в путешествие! 
Понравилась игра? Не забудь поставить палец вверх (👍) и добавить игру в избранные (🌟). Спасибо! 
Также, загляни в нашу группу! https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840 

Бонусы группы:

 --- на 25% больше золота!

--- на 300% больше здоровья! --- 
--- на 25% больше золота! ---
🌟Лояльный участник🌟 
--- +4 бочки ТНТ! --- 
--- на 300% больше здоровья! --- 
--- на 25% больше золота! ---"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2303922,"totalDownVotes":241848,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":48440,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2108857,"totalDownVotes":651637,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":46048,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":88853,"totalDownVotes":7237,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":14904,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1181625,"totalDownVotes":67513,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":18235,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"벌떼 시뮬레이터에서 나만의 벌떼를 키우고, 꽃가루를 모으며, 꿀을 만드세요! 친절한 곰들을 만나 퀘스트를 완료하고 보상을 받아요! 나의 벌떼가 커질수록, 산속을 더 깊숙이 탐험할 수 있어요. 벌떼로 위험한 벌레와 괴물들을 처치하고, 맵 곳곳에 숨겨진 보물을 찾아봐요. 새로운 벌 종류와 각 종류의 특징과 성격을 발견하세요! 

Bee Swarm Simulator Club에 가입하여 무료 꿀, 간식 그리고 코드를 받으세요! https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":688685,"totalDownVotes":93897,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🎑 [TOTEM UPDATE!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":15984,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Bienvenidos a Islas!

 🌲 Construir su propia isla
 👩‍🌾 Crear granjas grandes
 💸 Vender artículos para ganar dinero
 👨‍🍳 Cocinar delicias sabrosas
 ✨ Buscar a artículos valiosos
 🔥 Y más

🌵 Update Log (August 9):
- Potion Brewing
- Desert Island
- Skorp Mob
- Basic Bow
- Artifact Bow
- Vamp Bow
- Red Sandstone Block (with brick, slab and stair)
- Added 3 new music disks found from killing mobs
- Dead Bush
- Improved Inventory Tooltips
- Selected Item Title
- Added French Translations

🎵 Música por: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":262120,"totalDownVotes":138814,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":17376,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1787836,"totalDownVotes":139519,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":7647,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":907951,"totalDownVotes":118205,"universeId":892043755,"name":"Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":9277,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 74 🚨
🐰 Easter has arrived at Bubble Gum Simulator!
😮 Check out the event area in the main world!
🏆 10 eggs have been hidden - follow the clues to complete this year’s special Egg Hunt!
🥚 3 new eggs (Cracked Egg, Eastery Egg, Cosmic Egg)
🐶 48 new pets!
🔥 ????
💪 Complete Easter Event challenges every day to earn exclusive prizes!
🏆 Unlock special rewards for completing the Easter Pass!
🎮 Gamepad controls improved

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":183464,"totalDownVotes":30104,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":6559,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":9162125,"creatorName":"InnoVision","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":48026,"totalDownVotes":3791,"universeId":2331157949,"name":"[UPDATE 4] Super Evolution [BETA]","placeId":6312753269,"playerCount":9682,"imageToken":"T_6312753269_3041","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Current Codes: 45KLIKES, 10MVISITS (And secret Codes around the Map!)

Welcome to Super Evolution! Train your Strength, Endurance, Energy and Agility to become the Strongest Saiyan in the Universe! Will you top the Leaderboards and awaken your full potential?

📝 UPDATE 4: 📝
- BOSS FIGHTS!
- Reputation - Are you Good or Evil?
- 3 New Leaderboards
- Key Binding
- New INSANE Capsule
- Brand New Ki Type!
- 10 New Quests
- 3 New Stat Upgrades
- New Side Quest NPC
- Glitch Fixing

🔔 Click the game's FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates! 

👁‍🗨 Join us at 'InnoVision' for Group Rewards:
 - https://www.roblox.com/groups/9162125/InnoVision

🎮 Controls:
 - Charge Ki (PC: Hold 'X' | Console: Hold 'X' Button | Device: Hold Charge Button)
 - Run/Ki Boost (PC: Press CTRL | Console: Press L3 | Device: Hold Boost Button)
 - Block (PC: Hold 'F' | Console: Hold 'B' Button | Device: Hold Block Button)
 - Lock-On (PC: Press 'L' | Console: Right DPAD | Device:"},{"creatorId":409640380,"creatorName":"MUCDICH","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":140609,"totalDownVotes":15657,"universeId":2294168059,"name":"The Mimic ","placeId":6243699076,"playerCount":12185,"imageToken":"T_6243699076_ec39","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Chapter 3 is finally here! 

CONTROLS:
Shift to Run for PC
L2 to Sprint for XBOX

ABOUT:  You go back to your old high school in hopes of finding your missing group of friends, however, you encounter a mysterious entity that lurks within your school. Eventually, you venture into the unknown depths of a mysterious world.


WARNING: This game contains Flashing lights, Loud Noises & Jumpscares!


Join the group for updates and your support:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/9482918/CTStudio#!/about

This game is not based on the movie. It was coincidentally made with the same title.


For best experience use headphones.

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
